subprocess_flow.description: The initial step involves a comprehensive analysis of the current market landscape. This includes identifying market trends, understanding customer needs, and assessing the competitive environment. The insights gained from this analysis will inform the development of the overall business strategy.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To gain a deep understanding of the market environment.
subprocess_flow.scope: Focuses on external market factors and customer insights.
governance_requirements: Regular review of market data sources

subprocess_flow.description: This sub-step focuses on evaluating the competitive environment to identify key players, their strategies, and their market positioning. This assessment helps the company understand its competitive advantages and disadvantages, informing strategic decisions related to market positioning and differentiation. The team will analyze competitors' products, pricing, marketing, and sales strategies.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To understand the competitive environment and identify opportunities for differentiation.
subprocess_flow.scope: Focuses on competitor analysis and market positioning.

subprocess_flow.description: Based on the market and competitive analysis, this sub-step involves defining the strategic goals for the company. These goals should be specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound (SMART). They will guide the development of business initiatives and resource allocation plans. The team will work to align the goals with the overall vision and mission of the company.
success_criteria: Alignment with company vision and mission
subprocess_flow.purpose: To establish clear and measurable objectives for the company.
subprocess_flow.scope: Focuses on defining the overall direction and objectives of the company.

subprocess_flow.description: This sub-step involves developing specific business initiatives to achieve the defined strategic goals. These initiatives should be actionable and aligned with the company's capabilities and resources. The team will outline the scope, objectives, and expected outcomes of each initiative. The initiatives will be prioritized based on their potential impact and feasibility.
success_criteria: Defined project plans and resource allocation
subprocess_flow.purpose: To create actionable plans to achieve the strategic goals.
subprocess_flow.scope: Focuses on developing specific projects and initiatives.

step_risks_and_controls.risk: Lack of alignment between initiatives and goals
step_risks_and_controls.control: Regular review of initiatives against goals

subprocess_flow.description: This sub-step focuses on creating a detailed resource allocation plan to support the implementation of the business initiatives. This includes allocating financial, human, and technological resources to each initiative. The plan should be realistic and aligned with the company's budget and capabilities. The team will work to optimize resource allocation to maximize the impact of the initiatives.
subprocess_flow.purpose: To ensure resources are allocated effectively to support the business initiatives.
subprocess_flow.scope: Focuses on financial, human, and technological resource allocation.
